name: Autotrophs [Morphogenetic Series #1]
description:
→  The Autotroph series of prints were created with a bespoke software simulating the process of analogue video feedback. The video signal, as 'morphogen',  self-replicates to create crystalline life-forms reminiscent of radiolarians.  The prints hint at the layouts of Victorian monographs such as Haeckle’s famous illustrations in ‘Kunstformen der Natur’

→ Originally exhibited at Artware 5, The North American Cultural Institute, Lima, Peru in 2010 (Re-rendered in 2021)

→ Edition of 3
